metadata.title: CVE-2024-49989 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: fix double free issue during amdgpu module unloadFlexible endpoints use DIGs from available inflexible endpoints,so only the encoders of inflexible links need to be freed.Otherwise, a double free issue may occur when unloading theamdgpu module.[  279.190523] RIP: 0010:__slab_free+0x152/0x2f0[  279.190577] Call Trace:[  279.190580]  <TASK>[  279.190582]  ?
